mapper.insert: insert into auto_warehouseDB.checkInput(orderID, sid, num, statement, state) values (#{orderID}, #{sid}, #{num}, #{statement}, #{state});
mapper.update: update auto_warehouseDB.checkInput set state="用户已确认" where orderID=#{orderID} and sid=#{sid};
mapper.select: select * from auto_warehouseDB.checkInput where orderID=#{orderID} and 0>num and state="用户已确认";
select * from auto_warehouseDB.checkInput where orderID=#{orderID} and 0>num and state is null;
select * from auto_warehouseDB.checkInput where orderID=#{orderID} and statement="实际到货缺少该物品";
select * from auto_warehouseDB.checkInput where orderID=#{orderID} and sid=#{sid};
